ValidationRule.description: When email response is yes, originator email must be completed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordType.Name = 'Service Support 401k/S125 Case', ISPICKVAL( Email_Response__c ,"Yes"), ISBLANK(Originator_Email_Address__c), NOT(BEGINS( $Profile.Name , "System Administrator") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If email response is marked yes you must enter the originators email address
